metadataAttributes.Title: Drug Development
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: The University of California San Diego, Skaggs School of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences Drug Development course brings you lectures from both faculty and industry experts.   With this course, recorded on campus at UCSD, we seek to share our access to top people in the field who bring an unprecedented range of expertise on drug development.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Clinical Research,Drug Development,Clinical Trial Design,Clinical Development,
